patterns: How can I place an order?

patterns: How long does the delivery take?
Do you offer international shipping?
responses: Delivery times may vary depending on your location. For domestic orders within Lagos, Abuja, and Port Harcourt, shipping typically takes one business day. For other states in the country, it usually takes 2-3 business days. We also offer international shipping to select countries, and the shipping duration for international orders depends on the destination.

patterns: What is your return policy?

responses: We have a 30-day return policy. If you are unsatisfied with your purchase, you can return or exchange the product within 30 days of receiving it. Please review our return policy on our website for more details.

patterns: How do I choose the right size?
Can you assist me with sizing?
responses: We have a size guide available on our website that can help you find the perfect fit. You can also reach out to our customer support team for personalized sizing assistance.

patterns: What materials are your clothes made of?
Can you tell me about the fabric used in your products?
responses: Our clothing is made from high-quality materials such as cotton, polyester, and blends. Each product's specific fabric information is mentioned in the product description on our website.

patterns: How should I care for my shoes?
Do you have any shoe care tips?
responses: Proper shoe care can extend their lifespan. We recommend cleaning your shoes regularly, avoiding exposure to extreme conditions, and following the manufacturer's instructions. Check our website's shoe care guide for detailed tips.

patterns: Do you offer discounts for bulk orders?
Can I place a bulk order for my business?
responses: We provide special pricing and discounts for bulk orders. Please reach out to our corporate sales team or customer support for more information on placing bulk orders.

patterns: Do you offer gift cards?
Can I purchase a gift card for someone?
responses: Yes, we offer gift cards that make perfect presents. You can purchase them on our website or at our physical store. Gift cards can be redeemed for any product within the specified value.

patterns: Can you provide styling advice?
How can I style this particular item?
responses: Certainly! Our style experts can provide personalized styling advice. Please describe the item or provide its name, and we'll be happy to guide you on how to style it.

patterns: Can I modify my order?
How can I make changes to my existing order?
responses: If you need to modify your order, please contact our customer support team as soon as possible. They will assist you in making the necessary changes, depending on the order status.
